Name: NozomiNetworks
Author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
Description:
The [Nozomi Networks](https://www.nozominetworks.com/) solution provides the capability to ingest Nozomi Networks Events into Microsoft Sentinel. Refer to the Nozomi Networks [PDF documentation](https://www.nozominetworks.com/resources/data-sheets-brochures-learning-guides/) for more information.

1. **NozomiNetworks via AMA** - This data connector helps in ingesting NozomiNetworks logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the new Azure Monitor Agent. Learn more about ingesting using the new Azure Monitor Agent [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/sentinel/connect-cef-ama). **Microsoft recommends using this Data Connector**.

2. **NozomiNetworks via Legacy Agent** - This data connector helps in ingesting NozomiNetworks logs into your Log Analytics Workspace using the legacy Log Analytics agent.

**NOTE:** Microsoft recommends installation of NozomiNetworks via AMA Connector. Legacy connector uses the Log Analytics agent which is about to be deprecated by **Aug 31, 2024,** and thus should only be installed where AMA is not supported. Using MMA and AMA on same machine can cause log duplication and extra ingestion cost [more details](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/sentinel/ama-migrate).
